macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stocks Finish Mostly Flat Amid Softer Inflation Data
items.summary: The S&P 500 and Dow closed little changed on Friday, February 13, while Nasdaq added 0.2%, leaving major averages about 1.5% lower for the week despite a softer-than-expected January inflation report that failed to boost risk appetite amid AI volatility.

items.title: S&P 500 Inches Higher on Software Gains and Tame Inflation
items.summary: US stocks gained on Friday with support from software companies and easing January headline and core inflation rates as expected, lifting the three main averages by 0.6% and trimming prior session losses.

items.title: S&P 500 Hits 6836 with Minimal 0.05% Gain on February 13
items.summary: The US500 index rose slightly to 6836 points on February 13, up 0.05% from the prior session, though down 1.31% over the past month but up 11.80% year-over-year.

items.title: S&P 500 Shows Technical Breakdown Signs with Failed Breakouts
items.summary: The S&P 500 experienced failed breakouts signaling a darkening technical outlook, with Thursday's selloff breaking 20- and 50-day moving averages; support now at 6,790-6,825 amid rotation from growth to value sectors.

items.title: Asian Markets Decline Sharply in Premarket Trading
items.summary: Asian indices fell notably on February 13, with Nikkei 225 down 1.21% to 56,941.97 and Hang Seng dropping 1.72% to 26,567.12, reflecting broader global caution.

items.title: Upcoming Earnings and Fed Speakers to Drive Next Week's Volatility
items.summary: Post-Presidents' Day trading resumes Tuesday with NY Empire State Manufacturing, NAHB Housing Index, and Fed speakers; key earnings from MDT, PANW, CVNA, DASH, EBAY, BABA, DE, ETSY, WMT ahead.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Price Rebounds Above $70,000 Amid Cooling Inflation
items.summary: Bitcoin surged past $70,000, up roughly 2% in the past 24 hours to around $70,215, following softer-than-expected US inflation data at 2.4% year-over-year, boosting rate cut expectations. The rally supported altcoins and crypto-linked stocks like Coinbase (+18%) and MicroStrategy (+10%).

items.title: Crypto Market Rallies with BTC at $69,569 and ETH at $2,066
items.summary: The broader crypto market rallied over the past 12 hours, with Bitcoin up 0.83% and Ethereum up 0.62%, led by altcoins like PIPPIN (+21.3%) and Zcash (+16.6%). Stablecoin market cap hit $308B after a $6.5B surge.

items.title: US Accelerates Crypto Regulation Discussions, Europe Implements MiCA
items.summary: The US is pushing the Clarity Act and stablecoin rules amid White House talks, with Treasury urging swift frameworks and SEC-CFTC coordination. Europe advances MiCA while Asia tightens oversight, amid concerns over exchange operational risks.

items.title: Justin Sun Highlights TRON's AI and Stablecoin Infrastructure at Consensus Hong Kong
items.summary: TRON DAO sponsored Consensus Hong Kong 2026, with Justin Sun keynote on resilient blockchain for AI, noting TRON's 364M user accounts, 13B transactions, and $22B TVL, previously hosting largest USDT supply over $85B.

items.title: STRK Token Unlock of 4.61% Supply Today Amid Market Rally
items.summary: Starknet's STRK unlocks 4.61% of total supply on February 15, following a major January unlock, potentially affecting price and liquidity as the crypto market rallies.

items.title: Bitcoin ETFs See Modest Inflows but Weekly Outflows Persist
items.summary: US Bitcoin ETFs recorded $15.1M net inflows on February 13 amid cooling inflation and rate cut bets, but extended four-week outflow streak, with Fear & Greed Index at extreme fear (8).

items.title: Goldman Sachs Analysts Predict Crypto Transformation via Clearer Regulations
items.summary: Goldman Sachs analysts forecast that clearer cryptocurrency rules in 2026 will drive industry growth forward.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: India Plans Massive AI 'Data City' to Bridge Gap with US and China
items.summary: India is planning a vast new 'data city' on a staggering scale to power digital growth and narrow the artificial intelligence gap with leading nations like the United States and China.

items.title: Reports of Complications Mount as AI Enters Surgical Applications
items.summary: As AI integrates into surgery, mounting reports highlight complications and mistakes, amid FDA authorization of over 1,357 AI-enhanced medical devices—double the number from end of 2022.

items.title: AI Film School Trains Hollywood Professionals Amid Industry Shifts
items.summary: Schools like Curious Refuge are training Hollywood moviemakers in AI tools to adapt to generative AI changes, with predictions of job displacement but also new opportunities and reduced financial barriers for storytellers.

items.title: Christopher Penn Shares 5P Framework for Building Software with Agentic AI
items.summary: Marketing AI expert Christopher Penn outlines a workflow using the 5P framework for creating error-free software applications with agentic AI, enabling code generation without manual coding.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
